title: Samuelson on How Doing Business Has Changed
itunes:title: Samuelson on How Doing Business Has Changed
description:
Judy Samuelson, Vice President of Aspen Institute, discusses her book “Six New Rules of Business: Creating Real Value in a Changing World.”

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
